name: Road To Aztlan
description:
Venture yourself trough a haunted desert on this epic 2D action platformer about a warrior trying to find the legendary city of Aztlan. Enjoy the landscapes of a beautiful world accompanied by fluid combat and orchestral music! Beware, monsters ahead. 

This game was made for The Icehouse Jam 2019 in three weeks.

Controls (Recommended)

  • WASD Keys - Move
  • Spacebar - Jump | Double Jump
  • Left Click - Attack.
  • Right Click - Dash.

Controls - Alternate (No Mouse)

  • Arrow Keys - Move
  • Spacebar - Jump | Double Jump
  • X - Attack.
  • Z - Dash.

External Assets

Unless listed below, all the assets were made during the jam.

  • Music
    • Music composed by AIVA - Artificial Intelligence Virtual Artist (https://www.aiva.ai).
  • Font
    • Excalibur Noveau - Obtained from DaFont. Public Domain Licence.

Creation Specifics

  • Unity3D - Game Engine.
  • AIVA - Music Composition (first time using it, it's honestly really cool).
  • Audacity - Sound effect creation and edition.
  • Krita - Graphic elements.

WARNING: Mac build has not been tested, mainly because I do not have one to test. If you do encounter some bugs or issues, please report them on the comments below.

Follow me on Twitter! @elnapsu
